meanings.definition: Of or relating to the side of a choir on the right of a person facing the altar.
meanings.sent1: The cantoris singers stood on the right side of the choir during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The cantoris section of the choir harmonized beautifully with the rest of the singers.
meanings.sent3: The cantoris singers on the right side of the choir wore matching robes for the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared like a cantoris bird on the right side of the musical ensemble.
meanings.sent5: The cantoris singers on the right side added a touch of elegance to the choir's performance.

meanings.definition: A member of a choir who sings in the cantoris side.
meanings.sent1: The talented cantoris sang with passion during the choir's rendition.
meanings.sent2: As a cantoris, she practiced diligently to perfect her vocal skills.
meanings.sent3: The cantoris chuckled as they shared inside jokes during choir practice.
meanings.sent4: His voice, like a cantoris, blended seamlessly with the other choir members.
meanings.sent5: The cantoris's melodious voice resonated throughout the concert hall.
